channel.title: steam vac connection
channel.description: I've been having problems connecting to certain servers for css. i'm able to play for plenty of time. but on some servers it kicks me off after about 10 minutes because it "could not acquire connection to vac servers." at about the same time my friends list shows me as offline and says that i lost connection to the steam servers. any ideas on how to fix it?

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: Bobikan00sh
item.description:
sersoft:

just in case, disable firewall, open port 27015 on your router and disable QoS

are you fucking with me or serious?

cause i know that this is kinda a stupid topic but it only happens on the one css server that’s not full of faggots, so i’d like to actually be playing rather than messing with my shit.

Read full topic

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: Nosehole
item.description:
This is a common problem caused by the system32 virus.
Go to C:\Windows and try to delete the System32 folder. If it doesn’t work, get a linux liveCD, boot from there and try deleting the folder again - it will work.

Read full topic

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
I get it when my internet connection is throttled; check how much packet loss you’re getting when it disconnects you.

Read full topic

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
just in case, disable firewall, open port 27015 on your router and disable QoS

Read full topic

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: kewl
item.description:
I have been having this same problem as well. Restarting steam solves the problem temporarily, but like a couple hours later I’ll get it again.

It’s really bugging me, hope someone finds a fix for this.

Read full topic

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: Bobikan00sh
item.description:
lol nice ideas but my average game i go negative, and hacking doesn’t explain why i lose connection to all steam services like my friends list and buying games

Read full topic

item.title: steam vac connection
item.dc:creator: felipedomaul
item.description:
delete C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps<account name here>\counter-strike source\aimbot hax

will work like a charm

Read full topic
